attributes.action: RETHINK LAWS WHICH CONSISTENTLY DISADVANTAGE PEOPLE WHO WORK HARD
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THERE SHOULD THE SAME RATE OF PAY FOR EVERYONE OVER 18 NOT DIFFERENT RATES.  HOUSING SHOULD BE AVAILABLE TO FIRST TIME BUYERS THAT THEY CAN REALISTICALLY AFFORD. PEOPLE IN STABLE RELATIONSHIPS, WORKING, OR WITHOUT CHILDREN SHOULD NOT BE PUT AT A DISADVANTAGE IN EVERY GOVERNMENT SYSTEM.  TAXES SHOULD BE MORE LENIENT ON THOSE WHO ARE TRYING TO BUILD THEIR OWN FUTURES, EG. TAX BREAKS FOR GRADUATES, APPRENTICES AND THOSE IN FIRST EMPLOYMENT, ALSO FOR 1ST TIME BUYERS. STOP OVER CHARGING THE HARD WORKING TO PAY FOR EVERYONE ELSE.

rejection.details: Please resubmit without the excessive use of block capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
